src:
ロッテ、レアードと２年契約

02 Nov 2019

　ロッテは２日、レアード内野手（３２）と来季の契約に合意したと発表した。２年契約で、年俸は２２０万ドル（約２億３７６０万円）。日本ハムから今季加入し、来季が来日６年目となる。球団を通じて「とても興奮している。リーグ優勝し、クライマックスシリーズ（ＣＳ）を勝ち抜き、日本一になりたい」とコメントした。
　今季は１３９試合に出場し打率２割４分８厘、３２本塁打、８９打点だった。通算１６３本塁打で「２００本塁打を目指していきたい」と意気込んだ。（金額は推定）
text:
Two-year contract with Lotte and Laird

02 Nov 2019

Lotte announced on February 2 that it has agreed to a contract for next season with Laird Uchino (32). With a two-year contract, the annual salary is 2.2 million dollars (about 237.6 million yen). Joined from Nippon Ham this season, next season will be the sixth year in Japan. Through the team, he commented, “I am very excited. I want to win the league, win the climax series (CS) and become the best in Japan”.
This season, he participated in 139 games and had a batting average of 20: 4: 8: 32, 32 homers, 89. With a total of 163 home runs, he was enthusiastic about aiming for 200 home runs. (The amount is estimated)
